entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny except a mix of sun and cloud near the British Columbia border with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
